item.description:
One of reasons I came from New York to Boston is this..

I have been volunteering with the Boston All Stars (www.bostonallstars.org) since I moved from NY. This is a youth program dedicated to promoting human development through the use of an innovative performance-based model.

What I love about the All Stars is that it meets young people where they are, on the streets, and invites them to do what they love to do, perform. And then together, we create the opportunity for learning and growth. I love being able to be a part of the lives of young people from poor neighborhoods. Especially, when being a part means being a partner in their development.

I hope you'll join me in supporting the Boston All Stars by coming out to an evening of FUN with performances put on by our youth!!

I am one of Tri-Chair's of this fundraiser for the Boston All Stars.

Boston All Stars Perform!: On the streets where we live
It's a benefit with a silent auction. I'm really excited to have an opportunity to invite you to join me at this event.

Some Items for Auction:

A Luxury Timeshare in Cabo Mexico


www.lynda.com --1 Year Premium Membership for access to all courses, plus exercise files


A deluxe tune up from Ferris Wheels Bike Shop


-- Tutoring in Math and Social Net Working,


10-spinning classes at Synergy


This is the one I am most proud of. I wrote Meetup.com and they responded with the following..

2 â€“ Six month membership coupons to organize the group you always wanted on Meetup



Tickets are $30 before and $35 at the door. Also, here are other ways we could use your help.

-- You can win even if you are not at the event. With payment in advance, we will enter your name into the bags of the many raffles we will have..

--Donate an item we could include in the raffle or silent auction, such as a gift card, tickets to a sporting event, time at a vacation home, etc.

--Ask friends or family if they would like to make a donation for the raffle or auction.


I look forward to hearing from you and I hope you can join us!! .

To buy your ticket's in advance you can follow this link to paypal.. Boston All Stars PayPal site.

Or you can mail your check to us at the following address.
Boston All Stars
891 Center Street
Jamaica Plain, MA 02130
617 524-8111 for more info..



I will give more details to meeting up at the event soon..
item.how_to_find_us: YOu'll be greeted by our Youth & I will be managing the Box Office with a Smile!
